title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "The Ordeal of Mark Twain" by Van Wyck Brooks, Meridian Books", 1955
medium: Lithography in purple, red, black and white ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on the cover vertically at the lower right in white ink: lustig
On the top 3/4 of the cover in red  and white ink: THE/ ORDEAL/ OF/ MARK/ TWAIN [red]/ Introduction by Malcom Cowley/ VAN WYCK BROOKS [white]
Across the bottom in white: MERIDIAN BOOKS published by The Noonday Press/ Sewn-bound for durability M14 $1.25
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The front cover has a purple background and the back a pale yellow one. On the spine of the book are the title, author and publisher names printed vertically. On the back cover are the title, author and synopsis of the book. Produced for Meridian Press.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "The Ordeal of Mark Twain" by Van Wyck Brooks, Meridian Books", 1955.
1955. Lithography in purple, red, black and white ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-184.
